Kural_Info.Tamil_Text: ஒருமை மகளிரே போலப் பெருமையும்தன்னைத்தான் கொண்டொழுகின் உண்டு.
Kural_Info.English_Meaning: Like single-hearted women, greatness too, Exists while to itself is true.

Layered_Composition.Foreground: On one side, a virtuous woman ('Orumai Magalir'), exemplifying chastity and unwavering devotion, stands with quiet dignity. On the other side, a great and noble person ('Perumai') stands, embodying unwavering self-control and integrity.
Layered_Composition.Midground: A protective, unbreakable circle of pure white light surrounds both figures, originating from their own hearts. This light represents their self-guarding nature ('Thannai-thaan kondu ozhugin').
Layered_Composition.Background: A serene and stable landscape, symbolizing the steadfast and reliable world created by such unwavering virtue and greatness.

Art_Direction.Subject_and_Action: A parallel is drawn between the steadfast virtue of a chaste woman and the self-guarded integrity that constitutes true greatness.
Art_Direction.Symbolic_Motifs: The unwavering circle of light is the key symbol, representing the self-contained, self-protected nature of both virtues. The parallel stances of the two figures reinforce the analogy.
Art_Direction.Mood_and_Emotion: Dignified, pure, strong, serene, and steadfast.
Art_Direction.Lighting_and_Color: A soft, yet brilliant internal light emanates from the figures. The color palette is dominated by pure whites, creams, and soft golds to symbolize purity and integrity.

Technical_Cues.Camera: Balanced wide shot, 50mm lens, presenting the two figures with equal importance.
Technical_Cues.Resolution: 8K, ultra-realistic, with a focus on the serene and determined expressions of the subjects.
Technical_Cues.Lighting: Soft, ethereal, volumetric lighting that creates a glowing, protective aura.
Technical_Cues.Art_Genre: Classical allegorical painting, with mystical and symbolic elements.

Negative_Prompt: distressed figures, broken circles, modern attire, dark or chaotic background, text artifacts, oversaturated colors.
